Request - Class in fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.objects
The class Request defines objects representing requests in the M/M/1 simulation example.

requestArrivalEvent(Request) - Method in class fr.upmc.alasca.computer.components.VirtualMachine
Recupere la requete envoyee par le repartiteur de requete et l'envoie dans la file d'attente.
RequestArrivalI - Interface in fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.interfaces
The interface RequestArrivalI defines the protocol to send a request between an sender and a receiver Description The interface can be both required and offered, and it has only one method acceptRequest passing a request object as parameter.
RequestGenerator - Class in fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.components
The class RequestGenerator implements a component that generates requests for a service provider in a discrete-event based simulation.
RequestGenerator(double, int, int, List<Integer>, String) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.components.RequestGenerator
create a request generator component.
RequestGeneratorOutboundPort - Class in fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.ports
The class RequestGeneratorOutboundPort implements the outbound port for a component sending requests to another component.
RequestGeneratorOutboundPort(String, ComponentI) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.ports.RequestGeneratorOutboundPort
create the port with its URI and owner component.
